PHPObject

Packages that use PHPObject

Uses of PHPObject in net.collegeman.phpinjava
 

Methods in net.collegeman.phpinjava that return PHPObject
 PHPObject PHP.fx(java.lang.String fxName, java.lang.Object... args)
          Call the PHP function named fxName with arguments args
 PHPObject PHP.get(java.lang.String name)
          Retrieve the value of a global varialbe in the PHP execution environment.
 PHPObject PHPObject.getProperty(java.lang.String name)
          Retrieve a public property name of the wrapped Value.
 PHPObject PHPObject.invokeMethod(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object... args)
          Invoke the method name on wrapped Value object, passing into the invocation parameters args.
 PHPObject PHP.newInstance(java.lang.String className, java.lang.Object... args)
          Create a new instance of the PHP class className, initialized with arguments args.
 PHPObject PHPObject.setProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
          Set a public property of the wrapped Value to value.
 

Uses of PHPObject in net.collegeman.phpinjava.groovy
 

Constructors in net.collegeman.phpinjava.groovy with parameters of type PHPObject
GroovyPHPObject(PHPObject obj)
          The GroovyPHPObject is only allowed to wrap one kind of object: a PHPObject - the wrapper used by many methods in the PHP class.
